abstract: NFL Roundup; NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell asks competition committee to examine officiating; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. commissioner said that “no stone will be left unturned” in examining and improving officiating, which is an “integrity of the game” issue.

headline.main: Roger Goodell Says Committee Will Examine Officiating
headline.print_headline: Goodell Says Committee Will Examine Officiating

snippet: The N.F.L. commissioner said that “no stone will be left unturned” in examining and improving officiating, which is an “integrity of the game” issue.
